Articles.Content: Hello! I have been playing the KSP demo for several years now. I have been to the Mun many times while watching others play the full version on YouTube. I am on a limited budget so I rarely buy new (unused) games especially online. The last major PC game I bought was Minecraft back in 2011. I finally bought Kerbal Space Program about a week ago and it has consumed every free moment of this entire week. I absolutely love exploration games and have spent hundreds of hours playing Minecraft, StarMade, Silent Hill and the like. When I was a kid I spent just as many hours exploring the real backwoods of Crawfordville, Florida. I hope to have a great time exploring the KSP forums.

Hello SolitaryPoet and welcome to the KSP Forums!

I'm sure you'll have a great time exploring our fine community.  Glad to have you aboard.


Happy landings!
Your purchase will prove to be a splendid investment.
Welcome! You will definitely get your money's worth!

Thank you all for the great welcome. I have really enjoyed the full game so far, and I have no doubt that I will get more than my money's worth. Things are a lot more "explodey" in the KSP these days. It was almost impossible to die in the demo, so I am having fun with the learning curve.
